short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your links which you paste everywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While applying for jobs across many websites, we have to paste our LinkedIn, Github, Portfolio, Resume links on many forms. That time if we have a chrome extension which will save the links, copy, etc will be helpful. 
Made for the same. All it does is keep your links stored in your extension.
